channel.title: Non-.onion links on .onion home page, insecure and confusing
channel.description: non-.onion links to www.whonix.org on .onion home page (blog and forum entries, in various parts on the page), insecure and confusing

item.title: Non-.onion links on .onion home page, insecure and confusing
item.dc:creator: fortasse
item.description:
Please have a look at https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Forcing_.onion_on_Whonix.org.

It’s a non-ideal solution, but it’s the best we have at the moment. It’s difficult to run the same site with the same content on two separate domains without these hiccups.

Hope that helps!

Read full topic
item.source: Non-.onion links on .onion home page, insecure and confusing
